alert.note: Alert for Barry; Clinton; Eaton; Ionia (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 4:53PM EDT until June 25 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ionia County in south central Michigan... Northeastern Barry County in southwestern Michigan... Western Clinton County in south central Michigan... Northwestern Eaton County in south central Michigan... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 453 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Nashville, or 10 miles northwest of Charlotte, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ionia... St. Johns... Portland... Grand Ledge... Lake Odessa... Eureka... Fowler... Sebewa... Westphalia... Lyons... Maple Rapids... Muir... Sunfield... Mulliken... Pewamo... Woodland... Hubbardston... Eagle... Wacousta... Abrams Municipal Air... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
